      • handleAudioManipulatorOpenFileButton

        public void handleAudioManipulatorOpenFileButton()
        Method is called when user clicks the file button. Opens a file chooser and transfers the file to AudioManipulator if the file is valid.

      • handleMixerRecordButton

        public void handleMixerRecordButton()
        Method is called when user clicks the record button in Mixer. If toggle button is selected recording is active, else recording is inactive.

      • audioManipulatorOpenRecordedFile

        public void audioManipulatorOpenRecordedFile()
        Sets the recorded file as AudioManipulator's source

      • handleAudioManipulatorTestFilterButton

        public void handleAudioManipulatorTestFilterButton()
        Method is called when user clicks "test filter" button in Mixer. When toggle button is selected filter testing is active. When toggle button is not selected filter is inactive.

      • handleAudioManipulatorSaveMixedFileButton

        public boolean handleAudioManipulatorSaveMixedFileButton()
        Method is called when user clicks "save mixed file" button. Opens a file chooser and forwards the selected path to Controller

      • handleAudioManipulatorPlayButton

        public void handleAudioManipulatorPlayButton()
        Method is called when user clicks the play button in Mixer. Starts playing audio.

      • handleAudioManipulatorPauseButton

        public void handleAudioManipulatorPauseButton()
        Method is called when user clicks the pause button in Mixer. Pauses audio playback.

      • handleAudioManipulatorStopButton

        public void handleAudioManipulatorStopButton()
        Method is called when user clicks the stop button in Mixer. Stops audio playback.

      • handleAudioFileDurationSliderClick

        public void handleAudioFileDurationSliderClick()
        Method is called when user clicks the audio progress bar in media player. Forwards the value of the click to Controller

      • isMixerOkToExit

        public boolean isMixerOkToExit()
        Checks if there is an unsaved file in AudioManipulator. If there is it creates an alert to check if user wants to save the file.
        Returns:
        returns true if ready to exit, false if not

        Converts seconds to minutes and seconds.
        Parameters:
        seconds -
        Returns:
        Returns String in XX:XX format
